title: Lost because of a scripter.
body: Literally the only reason they won, we all won our lanes except for that one. I reported the player, so hopefully it goes through.

replies.body: I'm spectating their current game right now. Looks like a decent player, nothing more. I think you're just unfamiliar with a good player stutter-stepping/orbwalking (which is when you move between each autoattack).

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9lIT4A2J,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-21T05:30:32.735+0000)
>
> I'm spectating their current game right now. Looks like a decent player, nothing more. I think you're just unfamiliar with a good player stutter-stepping/orbwalking (which is when you move between each autoattack).

Perhaps.  But a quick google suggests that there is an orbwalking script out now.  So, even though I haven't seen the game, it wouldn't surprise me if a player using a heavy amount of orb-walking was also a scripter.
I watched the game. The player in question is just high Gold+, and the OP is new/very low elo and not used to skilled players.
so, you lost to a good player and think he was a scripter, to feel yourself better

No, I lost to a person who stutter stepped every thrown skillshot, one who auto attack moved faster then a human can react WHILE USING abilities. She would also w to the EXACT location to where their lee sin would kick me too, before I even got to the end of the animation. Keep note, that it was in fog of war. I highly doubt that's fucking possible, amigo, especially in silver elo

So, you got wrecked by someone better than you, so you blame scripting? 

You have to be a pretty horrible player in order to be worse than a script (that goes for the script user or their opponent) - scripts make lots of bad decisions and bizarre ability/movement miscasts.
